attributes.action: sing "We're Going To Hang Out The Washing On The Siegfried Line" through a megaphone while standing in a barrel of custard outside the Houses of Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You want a left-wing government? How about a Marxist one? That's Groucho-Marxist, folks. Anyway, singing "We're Going To Hang Out The Washing On The Siegfried Line" through a megaphone while standing in a barrel of custard outside the Houses of Parliament is a considerably more rational thing to do than, for example, the introduction by stealth and lies of the most intrusive surveillance system in the "free" world, or the illegal invasion of another sovereign state

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
